Plot: When millionaire James King is jailed for fraud and bound for San Quentin, he turns to Darnell Lewis to prep him to go behind bars.
Title: Get Hard
Writer: Jay Martel (screenplay), Ian Roberts (screenplay), Etan Cohen (screenplay), Adam McKay (story), Jay Martel (story), Ian Roberts (story)
Actors: Will Ferrell, Kevin Hart, Craig T. Nelson, Alison Brie
tomatoConsensus: A waste of two fine funnymen, Get Hard settles for tired and offensive gags instead of tapping into its premise's boundary-pushing potential.
